title: What is the OQATA 10-step onboarding?
content: The OQATA 10-step GSRS onboarding is a structured program that guides new members through daily habits, product usage, prospecting scripts and training sessions to quickly build confidence and early results.
answer: The OQATA 10-step GSRS onboarding is a structured program guiding new members through daily habits, product usage, prospecting scripts and scheduled trainings to generate early momentum and repeatable results.

title: What products does OQATA offer?
content: Featured products include Colon Detox, Super Focus Bacopa Gummies, Resveratrol, Andro-T, Liver Care, Hair/Skin/Nails, Super Omega-3, Trimtone Enhancer and Muscle-Bone Care.
answer: OQATA features 9 core products such as Colon Detox, Super Focus Bacopa Gummies, Resveratrol, Andro-T, Liver Care, Hair/Skin/Nails, Super Omega-3, Trimtone Enhancer and Muscle-Bone Care. Each product comes with promotion scripts and evidence-based benefit lists in the training materials.

title: How does the compensation plan work?
content: The compensation plan includes 10 ways to earn: Retail Profit, Sponsor Bonus, Pairing Bonus, Upgrade Bonus, Binary Check-Match, Stair-Step, Generational Leadership, Car & Lifestyle Trip, Furaha Points and Jenga Points.
answer: OQATA's compensation plan includes multiple streams such as retail profit, sponsor bonuses, pairing and upgrade bonuses, generational leadership incentives, and other recognition and reward programs. Refer to the detailed compensation guide for exact percentages and rank requirements.
